description: Detects suspicious flags used by PsExec and PAExec but no usual program name in command line
false_positives: Weird admins that rename their tools
Software companies that bundle PsExec/PAExec with their software and rename it, so that it is less embarrassing
name: PsExec/PAExec Flags
query: ((process.command_line:(*\ \-s\ cmd.exe OR *\ \-s\ \-i\ cmd.exe) OR (process.command_line:*accepteula* AND process.command_line:*\ \-u\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-p\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \\\*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*paexec* OR *PsExec*))))
author: Florian Roth
